title: Ep. 543 - Don’t Let Them Distract You
description:
A killing in Georgia has Americans at each other’s throats on race, guns, and criminal justice. But while the Left gins up a fake race narrative and riles everyone up over a very sad local story, a major national political scandal implicating the highest levels of the Obama administration goes uncovered. How convenient. Then, CBS gets caught lying about coronavirus, NBC gets caught lying about Attorney General Barr, and a reopened Georgia disproves the COVID prophets of doom and gloom.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Knowles
